text: The Peanuts Movie is a 2015 computer-animated comedy movie made by 20th Century Fox and Blue Sky Studios. It was released on September 6, 2015 in the United States. It follows Charlie Brown and Snoopy in the movie. The Peanuts Movie was Blue Sky's final G-rated movie. The CGI animation of the movie resembles hand-drawn. This makes The Peanuts Movie the only Peanuts movie in CGI. ==Voice cast (alphabetical)== * Troy "Trombone Shorty" Andrews as Miss Othmar * Rebecca Bloom as Marcie * Troy "Trombone Shorty" Andrews as Mrs. Little Red-Haired Girl * Anastasia Bredikhina as Patty * Francesca Angelucci Capaldi as the Little Red-Haired Girl * Francesca Angelucci Capaldi as Frieda * Alex Garfin as Linus * Noah Johnston as Schroeder * Bill Melendez as Snoopy * Hadley Belle Miller as Lucy * Micah Revelli as the Little Kid * Noah Schnapp as Charlie Brown * Venus Omega Schulteis as Peppermint Patty * Madisyn Shipman as Violet * Kristin Chenoweth as Fifi * Mariel Sheets as Sally * AJ Tecce as Pigpen * Marelik "Mar Mar" Walker as Franklin * Bill Melendez as Woodstock * William "Alex" Wunsch as Shermy Additional voices were provided by: Christopher Campbell, Holly Dorff, Tessa Netting, Kelly Michelle Mills, Al Nelson, Randall Thom, Randy Trager, Gabriela Yates Whittle, Gia Bravos, Nikolas Bravos, Kori Elmore, Ava Kramer, Ava Leslie, Frances Bella Kayser, Terrence D. Weller II, Marley Pearson, Aram√© Scott, Ileanna Bravos, Nicole Wedel, Clayton Drier, Theodore Finn Kayser, Sam Lavagino, Jaiden A.M.
